entry.title: Almond Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Cleanser
Price: 25.00

Who doesn't love a good cleansing balm? Melt away makeup and remove impurities at the end of the day with our brand new soothing and calming skin cleansing balm. Made using a blend of all natural ingredients and organic botanical oils, this balm will leave skin feeling clean, nourished and hydrated. 

Suitable for daily use and perfect for all skin types. Recommended as part of your PM skincare routine. No fragrance added.

Key Ingredients and Benefits

  • Organic Sweet Almond Oil - This beautiful botanical oil relieves dryness, keeps skin hydrated and relieves itching sensations due to it being naturally rich in Vitamin E. It is also perfect for those with more oily skin as it cleans impurities, dirt and excess oil from pores. Almond oil is quickly absorbed and keeps moisture in your skin balanced.
  • Organic Sunflower Oil - Improve skin texture and redness with this beautiful anti-inflammatory oil. Rich in Linoleic Acid (Omega-6 fatty acid) and Vitamin E, this oil is perfect for those with dry skin as it improves hydration.Rich in antioxidants such as Vitamin A, C , D and E , this oil will also help fight acne causing bacteria while protecting skin.
  • Organic Castor Seed Oil - A natural hydrating and moisturizing oil which has antibacterial properties and is rich in antioxidants. Naturally antibacterial and anti-inflammatory, this oil is rich in ricinoleic acid which hydrates and treats inflamed skin.
  • White Kaolin Clay - A mild and gentle clay which provides a gentle exfoliation which clears pores, soothes skin and absorbs excess oil which can cause blemishes or acne. Continued use of kaolin clay can also improve skins overall appearance and tone.
  • Colloidal Oatmeal - Proven to sooth redness and skin irritations caused by common skin issues such as acne, eczema and psoriasis. Restorative, hydrating and soothing, this amazing superfood deeply cleanses and provides a gentle exfoliation.

How to use

Scoop out a desired amount with dry fingers and massage onto skin. Add water to emulsify. Rinse off excess balm with water or wipe away with a damp cloth or reusable cotton round. Pairs perfectly with our Eye Makeup Remover and Cleansing Oil.

Full Ingredients List 

Prunus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil*, Stearic Acid, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride*, Glycerine, Avena Sativa (Oat) Powder, White Kaolin Clay, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Xanthan gum. *Organic ingredient 

Product Information

  • All natural, cruelty free, vegan cleanser
  • Fragrance free, PEG free, non toxic ingredients
  • Not recommended for topical use for those with a tree nut allergy
  • 4 oz recyclable/reusable glass jar packaging with recyclable plastic lid
  • Due to being an oil based product, it is preservative free. Please do not store in shower and avoid direct contact with water. Apply using dry fingers and emulsify when it is on the skin.
  • Do not get directly in eyes
  • Store in a cool, dry place
  • Shelf life 12 months after opening with proper storage
  • Stop use immediately if any irritation occurs

entry.title: DAMAGED PACKAGING - Adult Soft Activated Charcoal Bristle Toothbrush
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brush Naked Bamboo Toothbrush Co
Type: Toothbrush
Price: 5.00

*Exterior box has become opened along the seam. Toothbrush is wrapped in separate biodegradable cello so is unaffected*

Black is the new black! Choose one of the Brush Naked Binchotan charcoal infused Adult Soft Dupont nylon bristle toothbrushes to get a brilliant smile. Charcoal bristles are known to absorb chemicals such as chlorine from tap water. The charcoal works by acting like a magnet for plaque and tannins that may stain teeth. This effect is enhanced by combining our charcoal bristle toothbrush with activated charcoal toothpaste! 

Features + Benefits

  • 100% biodegradable bamboo handle
  • BPA-free DuPont nylon bristles infused with charcoal
  • Each brush is wrapped in 100% biodegradable/compostable cello which is made from wood and cotton pulp
  • Paper box packaging is compostable and biodegradable
  • Each bamboo toothbrush is naturally anti-bacterial and anti-microbial
  • Lasts 3 months (or longer)

entry.title: Original Branded Packaging | Thong Washable Daily Liners - Set of 4 - White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Smartliners
Type: Daily Liners
Price: 14.00

Original branding on packaging, contents still the same!

Smartliners organic washable thong daily liners are perfectly designed for everyday protection, giving you a comfortable, clean and fresh feeling.

  • 5” x 2” pad 
  • EasyWing™ pull 'n seal (hook and loop) no-nonsense closure system
  • Certified Eco-friendly 100% organic cotton
  • For light secretions, menstrual cup backup and can also be used throughout the month
  • Undyed cotton
  • Free of any harmful chemicals and plastics
  • Extremely comfortable
  • Odour free
  • Easy to maintain & long lasting
  • 4 daily liners in a canister
  • Includes travel/wash pouch

      How to use

      Just place them in your underwear, and strap the wings in place with the EasyWing™ hook and loop closure system. You're done!

      Why switch to reusable pads?

      Switching to Smartliners™ is kinder to your skin, your wallet and the planet! Smartliners™ washable period pads are like reusable wipes - once you've tried them you'll wish you'd swapped earlier!

      Product Information

      • Please wash your new Smartliners product before first use
      • Once used, you may rinse them out if you wish, or simply throw them in directly with your regular wash or in a mesh garment bag.  Make sure you close the EasyWing™ hook and loop closure prior to washing.
      • Do not use softener or bleach
      • Smartliners™ may be safely placed in the dryer; no shrinkage to fear!

entry.title: Reusable Organic Cotton Facial Rounds - Pink
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Washable Reusable Organic Cotton Rounds
Price: 15.00

Reusable bubblegum pink facial rounds made from 100% organic cotton! These reusable cotton rounds are the perfect replacement for single-use cotton pads, cotton balls and make up remover wipes. Each reusable cotton round can be washed over 200 times making them the perfect eco-friendly alternative in your skincare routine. 

Features + Benefits

  • 10-pack of 3" diameter pads and mesh wash/carry bag both made from 100% GOTS Certified organic cotton 
  • Organic cotton reusable facial rounds can be washed over 200 times
  • Sustainable and eco-friendly alternative to disposable cotton pads and make up remover wipes
  • 3 layers of organic cotton make these reusable cotton rounds extremely soft and extremely durable
  • Pink coloured reusable cotton facial rounds are perfect for applying and removing skincare and beauty products

How to use

Use these organic cotton face wipes to remove makeup, cleanse your face, for applying toner or whatever else you need them for throughout your skincare routine. Once used, simply throw used rounds into your new wash bag and toss them into your machine.

Make sure you wash all your pads before first use. Wash on medium cycle. Air-dry pads after wash to maintain shape or line dry.

entry.title: Monty's Compostable Cornstarch Dog Poop Bags, 120 Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Biodegradable Dog Poop Bags
Price: 15.00

Introducing our brand new eco-friendly, biodegradable and home compostable dog poop bags! Our bags have been designed to offer dog owners, sitters and walkers a more eco-friendly alternative to conventional plastic poop bags.

Monty's Cornstarch Poop Bags are made from cornstarch and renewable bio-based plant materials PLA and PBAT and are designed to biodegrade fully when returned to the Earth leaving zero harmful toxins, chemicals or waste behind.

Conventional plastic poop bags can take 500+ years to break down, if ever. Our compostable bags take a maximum of 3-6 months to fully decompose making these an amazing sustainable swap.

Features + Benefits

  • BPI® Certified Compostable
  • 8 Rolls, 120 bags per box
  • Each box lasts roughly 2 months, depending on frequency of use
  • 100% plastic free, eco-friendly, biodegradable and compostable
  • Packaged in 100% recyclable paper box
  • Unscented, fragrance free
  • Durable and leak proof, designed to handle even the biggest  

    💩 

Monty's Bags are made from

  • Cornstarch which is the starch derived from corn grain.
  • PLA is a  renewable bio-based plant material which fully breaks down when returned to the soil, leaving toxins or chemicals behind.
  • PBAT or  polybutylene adipate terephthalate is  renewable bio-based plant material which fully breaks down when returned to the soil, leaving toxins or chemicals behind.

entry.title: Biodegradable Loofah Exfoliating Mitt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Boutique Love Attack
Type: Exfoliating Gloves
Price: 4.00

This double sided exfoliating mitt is made from natural loofah and cotton. Made for cleansing and exfoliating, this waste free, natural and eco-friendly skincare tool gently and effectively removes dead skin on the body leaving it smooth and soft. Can be used in the shower or bath.

Made from

Natural loofah and cotton material.

How to use

Wet mitt in warm water and gently rub on skin with or without cleanser in circular motions. When finished, simply rinse and allow to dry naturally.

How to dispose

This mitt is made from 100% natural materials meaning it is home compostable and biodegradable. When your glove reaches the end of its life, you can put it into your home compost bin.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Bare Nature
Type: Facial Toner
Price: 20.00

Toners are a valuable part of your skincare routine. RENEW Toner restores moisture to the skin and improves texture. Apply to a clean face to help your skin absorb the nourishing benefits. Hydrating and corrective toner.

Ingredients

Water, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Distillate, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Water, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Water, Eco-Certified Preservative (Geogard), Boswellia Thurifera (Frankincense) Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil.

Type: Facial Toner
Price: 20.00

The second step in your skincare regimen helps to minimize the amount of dirt/oil/bacteria that gets back into your pores. Mist over your face to rebalance and gently minimize pores.  For oily and acne prone skin types.

entry.title: Compostable Tube Deodorant - Rosemary Sage
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bare Nature
Type: Deodorant
Price: 20.00

Bare Nature deodorants last a minimum of 6+ months of usage.

The entire package is fully compostable! The labels are even printed on Stone Paper (using 0 water) and are photodegradable.

How they work, is by eliminating the odour causing bacteria.  Leaving you smelling FRESH like your deodorant, and not that awkward combination of body odour AND deodorant. 

Natural earthy, forest scent, great for both men and women.

Ingredients

Theobroma cacao (Cocoa) seed butter, *Cocos nucifera (Coconut) oil, Euphorbia cerifera (Candelilla) wax, Mangifera indica (Mango) seed butter, *Helianthus annuus (Sunflower) seed oil, Zinc oxide (non-nano), Sodium bicarbonate (non-aluminum), Maranta arudinacea (Arrowroot) root powder.

Rosemary Sage: Tea Tree, Rosemary, Cedarwood, Sage, Lime

entry.title: Citrus Fresh Tooth Powder
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: All Natural, Vegan Tooth Powder
Price: 10.00

Citrus Fresh tooth powder leaves your whole mouth feeling clean and fresh with a citrus taste. Perfect for traveling, our liquid-free formula leaves you worry free about oversized liquids in your carry-on! 

Features + Benefits

  • No Glycerin
  • No SLS
  • No Flouride
  • No toxins
  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Plastic Free

How it works

The bentonite clay base not only cleans, but also draws out impurities and remineralizes your teeth. While other ingredients also help with maintaining odour and teeth health. 

How to use 

Simply wet your toothbrush and dip into powder. Brush as normal. Toothpowder will foam, but not as much as traditional toothpaste.

Ingredients

Bentonite clay, Xylitol, Baking soda, Himalayan salt, Calcium powder, Essential oils of Lemon, and Wintergreen.

entry.title: Recovery Skin Salve
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Vegan Skin Salve
Price: 13.00

Recovery Salve is great for when your body aches after a tough climbing session or long work day! Perfect for athletes to help soothe tension and pains.

Infused with anti-inflammatories, Arnica flowers and Menthol (found naturally in peppermint) for relief from inflammations, bruises and tension in the body. 


Features + Benefits

  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Plastic Free

How to use

Massage salve onto sore areas as needed. Should feel a slight cooling, refreshing sensation, but not overpowering.

CAUTION: Please wash hands before touching face as menthol will irritate eyes! If needed, rise out with soap and water. For external use only!

Not much is needed for it to work, so use sparingly. A little goes a long way so our salve lasts you longer!

Ingredients

Olive Oil, Shea Butter, Menthol, Candelilla wax, Arnica, Magnesium, and Essential oils of Camphor, Clove, Rosemary, and Lavender.

entry.title: Vegan Skin Salve
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Vegan Skin Salve
Price: 12.00

Use Onsight Vegan Skin Salve to keep skin in its best condition after a tough day of rock climbing, work or everyday life. Our salve is for everyone who is rough on their hands and needs some soothing repair after a long day. Great for dry skin, cuts and scrapes.

Vegan Skin Salve is formulated to absorb quick so it's less greasy than traditional salves. Not much is needed for it to work, so use sparingly. A little goes a long way so our salve lasts you longer!

Features + Benefits

  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Plastic Free

Ingredients

entry.title: Smooth Control Shampoo + Conditioner Bar for Oily Hair Types
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Shampoo + Conditioner Bar
Price: 19.00

No more worry about liquids spilling in your luggage! Save space and pack less with our 4-in-1 Bar. With natural, plant-based ingredients you can feel safe using our Smooth Control Bar for your next traveling or camping adventure.

Made for oily hair types. Say goodbye to greasy, weighed down hair, Smooth Control is made with nourishing nettle leaves, abyssinian and rosemary oils, which are sure to make your hair luscious and soft. Just try to keep your hands out of your hair now!

Onsight Care Smooth Control bar is PH balanced, so it cleanses without stripping your hair or scalp! With the added bonus of a separate conditioner side for extra detangling, no frizz formula that leaves your hair weightless and silky soft.

Lasts approximately 50 washes depending on personal use. Ditch the plastic and save 2-3 plastic bottles per bar! Bars come unpackaged, for traveling we recommend a Travel Tin for safe storage.  

Features + Benefits

  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Sulphate Free
  • No SLS or SCS 
  • Shampoo, Conditioner, Body wash + Shave bar 

To Use

The green side is Shampoo. Simply glide bar directly on your hair to lather and massage into scalp. Leave to sit for 2-5 mins and rinse out thoroughly.

The white side is Conditioner. Again, glide bar directly on your hair and massage well. Concentrate more on mid-shaft to ends. Let sit and rinse out thoroughly.

Keep the bar in a dry area in between uses to prolong its life.

Ingredients

Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate (coconut), Cetearyl Alcohol (coconut), Behentrimonium Methosulfate (rapeseed oil), Sapindus Mukorossi (soapberry) fruit, Cetyl Alcohol (vegetable oil), Cocamidopropyl Betaine (coconut), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (almond) oil, Crambe Abyssinica Seed oil, Lactobacillus/Arundinaria Gigantea Ferment Filtrate (bamboo), Butylene Glycol (vegetable oil), urtica dioica (nettle), panthenol (vitamin b5), spirulina platensis, Cymbopogon Flexuosus (lemongrass) Oil, Romarinus Officinalis (rosemary) oil.

To Use

The white side is Conditioner. Again, glide bar directly on your hair and massage well. Let sit and rinse out thoroughly.

Keep the bar in a dry area in between uses to prolong its life.

Ingredients

Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate (coconut), Cetearyl Alcohol (coconut), Behentrimonium Methosulfate (rapeseed oil), Sapindus Mukorossi (soapberry) fruit, Cetyl Alcohol (vegetable oil), Cocamidopropyl Betaine (coconut), butyrospermum parkii (shea butter), cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter, Crambe abyssinica seed oil, Lactobacillus/Arundinaria gigantea Ferment Filtrate (bamboo), Hydroxypropyltrimonium honey, Butylene Glycol (vegetable oil), Panthenol (vitamin b5), Althea Officinalis (marshmallow) Root, Lavandula Angustifolia (lavender) oil, Mentha Piperita (peppermint) oil.

entry.title: Eucalyptus & Peppermint Deodorant Bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Deodorant
Price: 11.00

Onsight Care's Deodorant Bar is excellent at absorbing and neutralizing odours to keep you feeling fresh all day long. Slightly scented with Eucalyptus and Peppermint essential oils.

Save the plastic waste! Deodorant Bar comes unpackaged, for traveling we recommend a Travel Tin for safe storage.

Lasts approximately 3 months depending on personal use.

Features + Benefits

  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Aluminum Free
  • Plastic Free
  • Baking Soda Free

How it works

Bentonite Clay absorbs moisture and toxins from the skin quickly which helps eliminate odour. While Magnesium replaces baking soda with a more gentle approach to killing bacteria on the skin that cause odour, without blocking your pores.


To Use

Use just as commercial deodorant and glide onto underarms. Goes on clear. Can be prone to melt if left in direct sunlight or heat, please keep in cool dry space to prolong its life.
Pro Tip: Hold on skin for moment to heat up first, then glide for easier application.

Ingredients

Shea Butter, Arrowroot Powder, Cocoa Butter, Candelilla wax, Coconut oil, Magnesium Hydroxide, Bentonite Clay, Eucalyptus and Peppermint Essential oils.
